title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.13 - Availability of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.13 - Availability of funds

State Regulations

No purchase order shall be issued, nor shall any be accepted
by the Comptroller, which is in an amount in excess of the unencumbered balance
of the appropriation or segregation thereof, chargeable with the
expenditures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
7.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
